title: any particular reason why Akali isnt disabled?
body: Still the most cancerous thing to every walk the rift.

replies.body: She has to be disabled because you don't like her?

She's basically soft-disabled, meaning that she's been nerfed until she's a troll pick, but people are technically still able to pick Akali and use Akali skins and stuff. If you face an Akali, she's going to annoy the heck out of you, but the odds of winning that match are in your favor.

> Still the most cancerous thing to every walk the rift.

{{champion:45}} old kit.

Also, and this last one is likely just my personal bias speaking. {{champion:53}} , literally for ever. Its so freaking insulting to lose a game where he was garbage the entire time but finally landed 1 game deciding Q when respawn timers are long.

If your extremely good at her mechanically and also good at macro play. Akali is a monster pick, but if your only good at her mechanically, she's mostly a troll pick, even if fed she's hard to carry with.
46% winrate btw, you are also entitled to a ban.
There are at least 100 champions who are worse than Akali being *slightly annoying* because she can't be point and click'd to death all time.
keep banning her every game (even if somebody on your team wants to pick her) until they revert the stealth thing
